name: Bisexual Beach Bro
description:
Itch seems to want to store my javascript on a separate host without a proper CORS policy in place. 

You can see a working copy of my submission at 

https://orangedrink.github.io/

disclaimer: THIS GAYME IS NOT SAFE FOR WORK

furthermore some of the behavior depicted in this game would be considered  harassment or sexual assault.  Please don't be like this.

Happy pride!

Environment art and some graphics taken from the excellent mini jam page created by KingW and Zahran at https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-108-seaside

Made using assets from the Universal LPC Spritesheet Generator

Authors: Benjamin K. Smith (BenCreating), Sander Frenken (castelonia), dalonedrau, Durrani, ElizaWy, Johannes Sjölund (wulax), kheftel, Marcel van de Steeg (MadMarcel), Matthew Krohn (makrohn), MuffinElZangano, Nila122, Pierre Vigier (pvigier), Stephen Challener (Redshrike), William.Thompsonj, Zi Ye, bluecarrot16, Michael Whitlock (bigbeargames), Thane Brimhall (pennomi)
